text: Tabe kena tomadera purbapurusadera madhye baki thaka lokajana ne'i yara nisedha kare prthibite biparyaya ghatate -- yadera amara ud'dhara karechilama tadera madhya theke sudhu alpa kayekajana chara? Kintu yara an'yaya acarana karechila tara anusarana karechila tadera yara ete sacchala-samrd'dha chila, phale tara chila aparadhi.
